item.title: Counting the golden arches
item.description: Counting the golden arches Is too much of a good thing ever a bad thing? If you are to ever step out of Andheri train station, you will be greeted by a bizarre sight. I had only heard of this from a couple of my friends but never seen it for myself. It is somewhat of a meme, with its own urban legends to boot. This time however, I had seen it for myself and it was all too real to ignore.
